issue.title: genomedata-load joins fasta contig name with rest of description line

content.raw:
Thanks for the report! If you’re not interested in sequence and only assembly layout we also recommend using AGP files if possible.

[Here is the link to the latest assembly on NCBI for hg38](ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/genomes/Homo_sapiens/current/GCF_000001405.39_GRCh38.p13/GCF_000001405.39_GRCh38.p13_assembly_structure/Primary_Assembly/assembled_chromosomes/AGP/). Admittedly it can be a bit difficult to find these files.
content.html:
Thanks for the report! If you’re not interested in sequence and only assembly layout we also recommend using AGP files if possible.

Here is the link to the latest assembly on NCBI for hg38. Admittedly it can be a bit difficult to find these files.
